# End User

**🧗 Mountaineers & Planners:** Use route risk data for planning safe ascents.

**🚶 Outdoor Tour Operators:** Design trekking experiences aligned with real-time conditions.

**🌍 Geographers & Researchers:** Study snow dynamics and monitor climate change effects.

*The tool especially assists commercial teams in preparing expeditions for the peak climbing season (April–May), enabling route and equipment selection based on predicted terrain risks.*
